enchantment.balanced_enchantments.volley: Makes the bow shoot a volley of arrows in an arc  [Bow]
enchantment.balanced_enchantments.block_: Summon souls to hold your enemy  [Hoe]
enchantment.balanced_enchantments.magma_: Solidifies lava if you slowly step on it  [Boots]
enchantment.balanced_enchantments.super_: Increase damage but weaker after attack  [Tools, Sword]
enchantment.balanced_enchantments.curse_: Break or fix an item in an uncontrollable way
